column4: Hey everyone, I am not sure this is an Ubuntu problem but my cd drive all the sudden doesn't get recognized by my computer (doesn't even show up in BIOS)

gnea: yeah, it opens up fine. I have 2 different CD drives and they both open and close fine but don't get recognized by BIOS. I have BIOS set to automatically find them, and I checked the cables and it all appears to be fine
I would usually agree but I put in a CD drive that I know for sure is functioning and the problem persists
